title: Was the World’s Youngest Mother Only 5 Years Old?
subtitle: Lina Medina, a Peruvian girl from the Andean village of Ticrapo who made medical history when she gave birth to a boy by caesarean section in May 1939.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The youngest mother on record was a Peruvian girl who give birth at five years old.
